General.Name: Shenzhen Jieshun Science and Technology Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Jieshun Science And Technology Industry Co.,Ltd. provides software and hardware products for smart car dealers and pedestrian entrances worldwide. The company offers intelligent parking management system and intelligent access control channel management system for use in residential properties, commercial plazas, office buildings, transportation hubs, government agencies, schools, hospitals, enterprises and institutions, and other social fields. It also engages in the software and cloud service business, which includes Tianqi intelligent IoT platform, parking lot cloud hosting service, cloud parking/cloud access control, urban parking management platform, and other related businesses. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

4.Name: Mr. Hengbo  Wang
4.Title: Assistant to GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
